meanings.definition: A parasitic infection caused by pinworms.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the child with oxyuriases after examining the stool sample.
meanings.sent2: Oxyuriases is common among school-aged children.
meanings.sent3: The pinworms threw a party in the child's intestines, causing oxyuriases.
meanings.sent4: The oxyuriases spread through the community like wildfire, affecting many families.
meanings.sent5: The itching caused by oxyuriases kept the child up all night.

meanings.definition: The condition of being infected with pinworms.
meanings.sent1: The school nurse informed the parents about the outbreak of oxyuriases in the classroom.
meanings.sent2: Proper hygiene practices can help prevent oxyuriases.
meanings.sent3: The pet cat joked that even she could get oxyuriases if she wasn't careful.
meanings.sent4: The oxyuriases in the family seemed to have a mind of their own, spreading from one member to another.
meanings.sent5: The fear of oxyuriases made the children wash their hands diligently.
